name: Farmer of Orkney
description:
Selectively breed pumpkins into different colors to satisfy the market. Protect your pumpkins during the night from invading mythical creatures.

Made for a game jam, was going to add upgrades to finish the game loop, but ran out of time.  More of a prototype at the moment.

Title Screen photo is by Kevin Phillips on Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/photos/seascape-landscape-shoreline-sea-1008696/

Music is by Yadu Rajiv: https://itch.io/profile/yadu
